name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lean Reader - the elegant reader mode

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reader mode for any website, with distraction-free and elegant reading experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lean Reader offers a clutter-free, distraction-free reading experience by removing ads, sidebars, and non-essential elements from web pages. It improves readability by optimizing text layout, making content easier to focus on and enjoy.
